The moment you set eyes on a Polo Vivo, you’ll see that every inch has been carefully considered to bring you a vehicle with charisma at every curve. 

To book a test drive contact Philwest Volkswagen located in Helderberg today!
attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen Polo Vivo 1.6 Highline 5-dr

attributes.description:
Everything about the new Polo will give you the drive to go further. The sharpened body design reflect confidence in true Polo style. The fresh design and new exterior features are just the start of the Polo’s innovation. As you look closer, the optional IQ.DRIVE features and advanced interior digitalisation reveal the intelligence behind confident driving.

To book a test drive contact Philwest Volkswagen located in Helderberg today!
